name: warpgate
description: Warpgate is a self-hosted secure access gateway for SSH, RDP, and databases. It provides auditing, session recording, and role-based access via web UI and configuration files.

features.title: Protocol Support
features.description: Provide secure access to SSH, RDP, MySQL, and PostgreSQL connections through a single gateway

features.title: Session Recording
features.description: Automatically record all sessions for compliance, auditing, and security review purposes

features.title: Role
features.description: Define granular permissions controlling which users can access specific servers and services

features.title: Web
features.description: Access SSH sessions directly from a browser without requiring terminal software on client devices

features.title: Single Sign-On
features.description: Enhance security with MFA support including TOTP, WebAuthn, and SSO integration

features.title: Connection Logging
features.description: Track all connection attempts, successful logins, and commands executed for audit trails

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Create and manage users, groups, and access policies through an intuitive web interface

features.title: Session Playback
features.description: Review recorded sessions with playback controls to investigate incidents or training purposes
